custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: violet0927
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OmniConsistency Nodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI OmniConsistency Nodes is a collection of nodes for ComfyUI that allows you to load and use OmniConsistency models.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ChatterBox
custom_nodes.description: An unofficial ComfyUI custom node integration for [a/Resemble AI's ChatterBox](https://github.com/resemble-ai/chatterbox) - a state-of-the-art open-source Text-to-Speech (TTS) model with voice cloning capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: bikiam
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_WhisperSRT
custom_nodes.description: This is custom node for audio transcribe with SRT.

custom_nodes.author: Chrisvenator
custom_nodes.title: painting-by-colors-generator
custom_nodes.description: Create a painting by colors image from an image

custom_nodes.author: wildminder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Optim
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI startup optimizer and patcher

custom_nodes.author: Chrisvenator
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Image Processing Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI focused on image processing operations.

custom_nodes.author: tetsuoo-online
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-too-xmp-metadata
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI that allow you to read and write XMP metadata to images

custom_nodes.author: alessandrozonta
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PoseDirection
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI analyzes OpenPose keypoints to determine if a person in an image is facing forward, showing their left side, or their right side.

custom_nodes.author: avocadori
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-load-image-prompt-lora
custom_nodes.description: NODES: YAML Image Cycler (Full), YAML Image Cycler (Simple), YAML LoRA Extractor, YAML LoRA Loader, YAML LoRA Selector

custom_nodes.author: vivi-gomez
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Fix Node Translate
custom_nodes.description: Addon for ComfyUI that adds 'Fix node (recreate + keep inputs)' context menu option

custom_nodes.author: violet0927
custom_nodes.title: Hugging Face LoRA Uploader
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node to upload LoRA models to Hugging Face Hub.

custom_nodes.author: aimingfail
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LikeSpiderAI-SaveMP3
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that saves input AUDIO as .mp3 using ffmpeg.

custom_nodes.author: thalismind
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Blend Image Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a ComfyUI node for blending images using various blending modes. Can be used to watermark images, create overlays, or apply effects to images in a ComfyUI workflow.

custom_nodes.author: boricuapab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Bori-JsonSetGetConverter
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that takes in a file path full of json's and finds the mape variable nodes in them and converts them to the kjnode set and get nodes.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_HunyuanAvatar_Sm
custom_nodes.description: HunyuanVideo-Avatar: High-Fidelity Audio-Driven Human Animation for Multiple Characters,try it in comfyUI ,if your VRAM >24G.

custom_nodes.author: KERRY-YUAN
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Spark_TTS
custom_nodes.description: Spark-TTS controllable synthesis and voice cloning.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ChatterboxTTS
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-ChatterboxTTS is now available in ComfyUI, Chatterbox TTS is the first production-grade open-source TTS model.

custom_nodes.author: babydjac
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Grok Prompts
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI nodes for generating prompts using Grok AI, enhancing prompt creation for text-to-image workflows.

custom_nodes.author: xhiroga
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FramePackWrapper_PlusOne
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for FramePack, supporting 1-frame inferences.

custom_nodes.author: p1atdev
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-timm-backbone
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Timm Backbone Nodes is a custom node set that enables you to load and use pre-trained models from the [a/timm](https://github.com/huggingface/pytorch-image-models) library within ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Zch6111
custom_nodes.title: AI_Text_Comfyui
custom_nodes.description: AI_Text_Comfyui is a custom node for ComfyUI that connects to the OpenAI Chat API and automatically generates creative text prompts for AI workflows. This simplified version removes external dependencies like dotenv, requiring the OpenAI key to be set using a system environment variable.

custom_nodes.author: XWAVEart
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI XWAVE Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of artistic glitch and image manipulation nodes for ComfyUI, featuring advanced noise effects, color manipulations, distortions, and more.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Chatterbox
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Chatterbox TTS & Voice Conversion Node

custom_nodes.author: LingSss9
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Merge-LoRA
custom_nodes.description: Merge up to 4 LoRA models with balanced, order-independent logic. Inspired by WebUI SuperMerger.

custom_nodes.author: whmc76
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RemoveBackgroundSuite
custom_nodes.description: A matting toolkit based on ComfyUI, supporting multiple matting models and detail processing methods.

custom_nodes.author: mrcuddle
custom_nodes.title: Underage Filter
custom_nodes.description: An implementation to detect underage subjects in images for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: ToTheBeginning
custom_nodes.title: DreamO Comfyui
custom_nodes.description: [a/DreamO](https://github.com/bytedance/DreamO) ComfyUI native implementation.

custom_nodes.author: SanDiegoDude

custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for integrating with the Fal Kontext API for advanced image editing and generation.

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI open nodes by juntaosun.

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for finding and analyzing mask sizes in images

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HunyuanVideo-Avatar
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-HunyuanVideo-Avatar is now available in ComfyUI, HunyuanVideo-Avatar is a multimodal diffusion transformer (MM-DiT)-based model capable of simultaneously generating dynamic, emotion-controllable, and multi-character dialogue videos.

custom_nodes.author: DragonDiffusionbyBoyo
custom_nodes.title: BoyoSupercoolWrapper
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI wrapper for Andrew DalPino's SuperCool upscaler, enabling its use directly within ComfyUI's node workflow. No extra dependencies required—just drop in the models and go.

custom_nodes.author: filliptm
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Fill-ChatterBox
custom_nodes.description: Voice Clone and TTS model.

custom_nodes.author: MijnSpam
custom_nodes.title: Comfy swap and scale
custom_nodes.description: Do you want to easily swap width and heigth? Than this is for you. From portrait to Landscape. Is you images model trained on 1MP pictures, then you can easily scale those down. For best pictures width and heigth should be a factor of 32, say no more...

custom_nodes.author: narusas
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Logic Support
custom_nodes.description: A collection of logic and utility nodes for ComfyUI to enhance workflow capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: wTechArtist
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI VVL Video Camera Advanced
custom_nodes.description: A professional video camera parameter estimation toolkit based on the VGGT model.

custom_nodes.description: General audio nodes.  Mix, Bass/Treble, Concatenate, Pitch, Add/remove silence, Speed

custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_LG_Tools
custom_nodes.description: This is a toolset designed for ComfyUI by LAOGOU-666, providing a series of practical image processing and operation nodes, making our operation more intuitive and convenient

custom_nodes.title: Skycoder Tools
custom_nodes.description: A collection of useful custom nodes for ComfyUI workflows

custom_nodes.author: KERRY-YUAN
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Float_Animator
custom_nodes.description: Float project applicable to ComfyUI.Generates speaking portrait video frames from an image and audio.

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Image-Effects
custom_nodes.description: Complete collection of image effects for ComfyUI - 32 nodes across 6 categories

custom_nodes.author: lxe
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OpenAI Compatible LLM Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that provides integration with OpenAI-compatible Large Language Model APIs, including OpenAI, local models, and other compatible endpoints. Supports both text-only and multimodal (text + image) interactions.

custom_nodes.author: aiaiaikkk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Curve
custom_nodes.description: A professional ComfyUI curve adjustment node that offers Photoshop-like curve functionality, over 70 preset styles, advanced mask support, and histogram analysis.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WarperNodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES: DWPose Scaler (Warper)

custom_nodes.author: dorpxam
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FramePack-F1-T2V
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes enabling Text-to-Video support for FramePack-F1

custom_nodes.author: gabe-init
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-11labs
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI ElevenLabs TTS Node - Text-to-speech integration with advanced voice controls

custom_nodes.author: gabe-init
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Google-Image-Search
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Google Image Search Node - Search and retrieve images from Google

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-String-Similarity
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI String Similarity Node - Advanced text comparison with multiple algorithms

custom_nodes.author: SamTyurenkov
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_chatgpt
custom_nodes.description: Chat GPT Image Generation Chat Node for Comfy UI

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Cache Cleaner Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that provides the ability to clear the cache directly from your workflow.

custom_nodes.author: mittimi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_mittimiDaisyChainText
custom_nodes.description: It has the ability to concatenate text.

custom_nodes.author: openvino-dev-samples
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-OpenVINO
custom_nodes.description: OpenVINO node is designed for optimizing the performance of model inference in ComfyUI by leveraging Intel OpenVINO toolkits. It can support running model on Intel CPU, GPU and NPU device.

custom_nodes.author: coiichan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Depth-Visualization-advanced
custom_nodes.description: Works with any Depth Map and visualizes the applied version it inside ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: doubletwisted
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Deadline Submission
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI plugin for submitting workflows to Thinkbox Deadline for distributed rendering. Enables render farm distribution with configurable job settings, batch processing, and automatic seed variation.

custom_nodes.author: SXQBW
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen
custom_nodes.description: The Qwen3 ComfyUI Integration is a powerful tool designed specifically for ComfyUI workflows, aiming to seamlessly integrate Qwen series large language models (LLMs).

custom_nodes.author: SXQBW
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen-VL
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension for Qwen-VL series large language models, supporting multi-modal functions such as text generation, image understanding, and video analysis.Support for Qwen2-VL, Qwen2.5-VL.

custom_nodes.author: neverbiasu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BAGEL
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node package based on the BAGEL-7B-MoT multimodal model.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Bagel
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Bagel is now available in ComfyUI, BAGEL is an open‑source multimodal foundation model with 7B active parameters (14B total) trained on large‑scale interleaved multimodal data. [w/Don't install together with neverbiasu/ComfyUI-BAGEL simultaneously.]

custom_nodes.author: coulterj
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI SVG Visual Normalize & Margin Node
custom_nodes.description: This ComfyUI custom node processes SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) images to ensure the artwork consistently fills its canvas, is visually centered, and optionally has a margin applied. It's designed to provide more accurate results for complex vector graphics, such as those generated by vector tracing tools, where simple geometric bounding boxes may not align with perceived visual extents.

custom_nodes.author: GACLove
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Lightx2vWrapper
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Lightx2vWrapper is an inference wrapper for Lightx2v designed for use with ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: gabe-init
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OpenRouter Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that allows you to interact with OpenRouter's chat/completion API, providing access to a wide range of LLM models including GPT-4, Claude, Llama, Mistral, and more.

custom_nodes.author: papcorns
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Load Image From URL
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that allows you to load images directly from URLs or local file paths. This node provides a convenient way to import images into your ComfyUI workflows without manually downloading them first.

custom_nodes.author: TensorKaze
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TkNodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI with advanced image scaling, latent manipulation, and Flux sampling

custom_nodes.author: pureexe
custom_nodes.title: DiffusionLight-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: DiffusionLight (Turbo) implemented in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: MrSamSeen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SSBeforeAfterNode
custom_nodes.description: Two powerful custom nodes for ComfyUI to create stunning before-and-after transition videos. These nodes are designed for visual comparisons, transformations, and creative effects, supporting both standard and depth map-based transitions.

custom_nodes.author: hmwl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TaskMonitor
custom_nodes.description: A powerful task monitoring extension for ComfyUI that provides real-time progress tracking, workflow statistics, and execution monitoring.

custom_nodes.author: karthikg-09
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Vton-Mask
custom_nodes.description: A lightweight ComfyUI custom node for generating high-quality masks and pose detection for virtual try-on applications. This node extracts only the essential masking functionality from FitDiT without requiring heavy diffusion models.

custom_nodes.author: KAVVATARE
custom_nodes.title: RightEyeDisparity
custom_nodes.description: A simple ComfyUI node for generating right eye disparity for VR videos

custom_nodes.author: jaimitoes
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Wan2_1_lora_trainer
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI interface adaptation of the musubi-tunner library to train Wan 2.1 loras.

custom_nodes.author: angree
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Q_GLB_Material_Modifier
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for enhancing GLB 3D models generated with Hunyuan 3D 2.0. This module helps solve the common 'plastic look' problem by adding realistic materials and smart emissive elements.

custom_nodes.author: R5-Revo
custom_nodes.title: Universal LLM Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: UniversalLLMNode is a custom node for ComfyUI that provides a unified interface to use multiple major LLM APIs, including OpenAI, Anthropic (Claude), Google Gemini, Groq, and Mistral. It is ideal for tasks such as automatically generating high-quality SDXL prompts for image generation.

custom_nodes.author: ComfyAssets
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt Manager
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node that extends the standard text encoder with persistent prompt storage, advanced search capabilities, and an automatic image gallery system using SQLite.

custom_nodes.author: silveroxides
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_EmbeddingToolkit
custom_nodes.description: Toolkit for creating embeddings for various models in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: LevelPixel
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_LevelPixel_Advanced
custom_nodes.description: Advanced nodes of the Level Pixel company. Includes convenient advanced nodes for working with LLM и VLM models (LLaVa) with GGUF format. Qwen2.5-VL and Qwen2.5 supported. Also included is a node for the RAM model. Nodes have the ability to automatically unload models from VRAM.

custom_nodes.author: SanDiegoDude
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DeepStereo
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for DeepStereo, an auto-autostereogram generator

custom_nodes.author: ptmaster
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-audio-speed
custom_nodes.description: This node pack is designed to adjust audio playback speed within ComfyUI, particularly to sync audio with models like FantasyTalking (WAN) that require specific frame rates. It can also be used for general-purpose audio speed control.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Gemini_TTS
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node that brings Google's Gemini TTS capabilities directly to your workflow. Generate high-quality speech with 30+ voices supporting both free and paid tiers.
